tool_description: An API showing all the latest news about Climate Change around the world
name: Live Climate Change News From Popular Media Channels Around the World
title: Live Climate Change News From Popular Media Channels Around the World
tool_name: Live Climate Change News From Popular Media Channels Around the World

api_list.name: Get Individual Climate News of Source Media Channel
api_list.description: Get  latest news about Climate from specific Media Channel
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://live-climate-change-news-from-popular-media-channels-around-the-world.p.rapidapi.com/news/bbc"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "live-climate-change-news-from-popular-media-channels-around-the-world.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
